com.google.android.glass.TMM

Class SelectCardScrollAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • CardScrollAdapter
      • com.google.android.glass.TMM.SelectCardScrollAdapter

  • public class SelectCardScrollAdapter
extends CardScrollAdapter
    Adapter for the CardSrollView inside SelectCardActivity.

    • Field Detail

      • TAG

        public static final java.lang.String TAG
        The Constant TAG. Used for the Android debug logger.

      • mContext

        private final Context mContext
        The adapter's context, used here to access views.

      • mCount

        private final int mCount
        The number of elements in the adapter (i.e. the number of cards to display).

      • cardArr

        private TMMCard[] cardArr
        The array of TMMCard objects used by the adapter to diplay their contents.

      • ALPHA_VALUE

        private final float ALPHA_VALUE
        Controls the dimness of the backgrounds on the cards.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • SelectCardScrollAdapter

        public SelectCardScrollAdapter(Context context,
                               int count,
                               TMMCard[] content)
        Instantiates a new select card scroll adapter.
        Parameters:
        context - The adapter's context.
        count - The total number of cards being used in the adapter.
        content - The card array containing the card objects to display. The order of the array is the order in which the cards will be displayed.
